Text: thanks for sharing all of this.  and i don't mean to sound like a jerk, i was gonna grab some stuff off this but you have it all zipped up into one file.  if it wasn't 28+ gig.....  but appreciate the work you did into getting it all cleaned up and in order, i'm like that too.

Exactly what nickweed said.

Thank you for organising and sharing this.  I positively thrive on fruits of other's OCD, bless your lopsided little hearts.

If its not a major inconvenience, would you consider reupping your New 52 folder without zipping it?
